test.name: Test Open Researchers Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.name: Test Open Researchers Profile Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), '2526 วท.บ. (คณิตศาสตร์) - มหาวิทยาลัยขอนแก่น')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), '2526 วท.บ. (คณิตศาสตร์) - มหาวิทยาลัยขอนแก่น')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), '2528 พบ.ม. (สถิติประยุกต์) - สถาบันบัณฑิตพัฒนบริหารศาสตร์')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), '2528 พบ.ม. (สถิติประยุกต์) - สถาบันบัณฑิตพัฒนบริหารศาสตร์')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), '2544 วท.ด. (วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์) - สถาบันเทคโนโลยีแห่งเอเชีย ประเทศไทย')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), '2544 วท.ด. (วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์) - สถาบันเทคโนโลยีแห่งเอเชีย ประเทศไทย')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), 'ศาสตราจารย์')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//h6[contains(normalize-space(.), 'ศาสตราจารย์')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//td[contains(normalize-space(.), 'วารสาร')]'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//teacher[contains(normalize-space(.), 'ศาสตรา วงศ์ธนวสุ')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//teacher[contains(normalize-space(.), 'ศาสตรา วงศ์ธนวสุ')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
